text: The Central Division is one of four divisions in Fiji. The capital of the division is Suva, which is also the capital of Fiji. It has five provinces - Naitasiri, Namosi, Rewa, Serua and Tailevu. The division includes the eastern part of the largest island in Fiji, Viti Levu. There are also a few outlying islands, including Beqa. Category:Divisions of Fiji
title: Central Division, Fiji
